org.gjt.sp.util
Class TaskManager

java.lang.Object
  org.gjt.sp.util.TaskManager

public class TaskManager
extends java.lang.Object

The TaskManager manage Tasks in the Threadpool, it knows all of them, and sends events to TaskListeners.
